<JD_START>
Job Title: Product Offering Generalist

Location: Elmhurst, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Research, Writing/Editing

Description:
Product Offering Generalist We are looking for broadly skilled, resourceful, and talented people to join our primarily remote team. People from a diverse range of backgrounds are successful at McMaster-Carr from archaeologists to engineers, business students to thespians; we’re interested in your ability to think and your drive to be challenged and rewarded.
Our employees will learn about McMaster-Carr’s operations with the potential to contribute to multiple areas of the business over time. These vital team members must be able to adapt to new tasks and environments quickly. Successfully contributing to one area of the business could lead to new roles and responsibilities in another.
This career area offers an opportunity to directly impact the information presented about the products we sell.
Responsibilities could include:Communicating with suppliers, evaluating the market, and leveraging guidelines to set pricing for productsReading product literature, gathering specifications, and updating our database with product informationMaking decisions about how to organize product information so that customers can quickly choose the right products for their needs
Strong candidates will produce high-quality work efficiently, while thinking creatively and critically to meet new challenges.
Culture of Development:Our work environment is active and collaborative, offering the stability of a century-old market leader with the excitement of a company that continues to grow and innovate to solve business problems. Opportunities are based on your performance and not your tenure with the company.
At McMaster-Carr, we offer an environment where employees encounter new opportunities, grow professionally, and have a life outside of work. Growth is supported by:Structured onboarding programContinued learning opportunitiesEmployee Resource Groups like Black Employees, Mi Gente, Pride Alliance, and Military Community100% tuition reimbursement for any accredited degree or course you take outside of work
Compensation and Benefits:
The starting pay range for this role is $70,000 – $80,000. Exact compensation may vary based on skills and experience. In addition to your base salary, you will also be eligible for Cash Profit Sharing and Retirement Fund (DPS) contributions. We offer benefits to build a healthy, positive workplace that allows you to do your best work:Generous profit sharingCompany-funded retirement accountsFirst-time home buyer assistanceCollege assistance for your dependentsPaid time off to cover vacation and personal timeMedical, dental, pharmacy, and vision plans with no monthly premiums for you, your spouse, and your dependents
About McMaster-Carr:For more than 120 years, McMaster-Carr has been supplying the equipment that keeps the wheels of industry turning. As an industry leader in distribution, operations, customer service, and publishing, we are a trusted partner of major and minor businesses, governments, and institutions across the continent.
At McMaster-Carr we help customers build anything because we offer everything – we stock and distribute more than half a million products, and our supply chain and logistics management allows us to deliver those products to our customers quickly and reliably.
Equal Opportunity EmployerWe are proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer and dedicated to providing employees a workplace with reasonable accommodations and free of discrimination, harassment, and retaliation. At McMaster-Carr, we do not make employment decisions based on age, ethnicity, citizenship status, military status, gender identity and expression, race, religion, disability status, marital status, sexual orientation, or any other legally protected group.
EOE/M/F/Vet/Disability/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
